Prediction of surface water temperature and its spatial-temporal variation characteristics of 11 main lakes in Yunnan-Guizhou Plateau
2305 :1 of our patents has been successfully accepted!
item.description: Completion of patent acceptance on 26 May 2023, congratulations!

item.title: Secure and Trusted Authentication Models under Edge Computing and Block Multi-Chaining
item.description:
This paper focuses on edge security. Based on ECDSA, edge computing is introduced in master-slave chain scenarios to achieve secure and trusted authentication, giving the cross-domain access model and authentication process.

**Congratulations!!! **
Until November 2023, our paper was selected as CNKI’s highly downloaded paper

item.title: A lightweight blockchain-based access control scheme for integrated edge computing in the internet of things
Urban Land Surface Temperature Monitoring and Surface Thermal Runoff Pollution Evaluation Using UAV Thermal Remote Sensing Technology
‘Access control model for Internet of Things (IoT) based on blockchain and edge computing’
item.description:
This paper is about Internet of Things (IoT) security. An attempt is made to implement Access control based on Blockchain in Cloud-Edge-End architecture and a SC-ABAC model and a simple prototype is given.SC-ABAC is a Smart Contract for Attribute Based Access control with improved POW consensus algorithm in the prototype.

**Congratulations!!! **
Until November 2023, our paper was selected as a Highly Cited and Highly Downloaded paper in CKI!
